data.value: Interval for screen capture (shorter = more accurate, longer = faster)

data.value: Quality of captured images (higher = more accurate, lower = faster)

data.value: Consider scaling in high DPI environments

data.name: Settings_Overlay_ARNote

data.value: Font size of translation text displayed on overlay

data.value: Time until live translation results automatically disappear

data.value: Time until shot translation results automatically disappear

data.value: Click overlay to manually hide it
